body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Louisa Tindle. Father of William Tindle, John Tindle, Thomas Tindle, James Tindle, Mary E. Tindle, Sarah C. Tindle, George Tindle, Jesse Tindle, and Elijah Tindle. Farmer in Hancock County in 1850 and 1860.
